metadata.title: CVE-2024-41089 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/nouveau/dispnv04: fix null pointer dereference in nv17_tv_get_hd_modesIn nv17_tv_get_hd_modes(), the return value of drm_mode_duplicate() isassigned to mode, which will lead to a possible NULL pointer dereferenceon failure of drm_mode_duplicate(). The same applies to drm_cvt_mode().Add a check to avoid null pointer dereference.
